entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
